document.full_text: a suicide bomber killed one of the most powerful men in north afghanistan on saturday, underlining the spread of insurgent violence in once peaceful parts of the country and casting a shadow over plans for afghans to take control of security.
document.title: suicide blast kills powerful afghan police chief
lines_and_colors: a suicide bomber killed one of the most powerful men in north afghanistan on saturday, underlining the spread of insurgent violence in once peaceful parts of the country and casting a shadow over plans for afghans to take control of security.
